Always look ahead to reach your goals, only look down when you have stepped on something along the way.
Always go the extra mile, because you don't know if the next one has dim sum.
Always finish what you start especially if you're at a buffet.
Patience is a virtue, unless you're at the DMV.
Money can't buy you happiness, but it can get you take out.
When opportunity knocks make sure you don't have your head-phones on.
Nothing is impossible. Except Monday mornings.
You are not illiterate.
If you don’t fight for what you want, don’t cry for what you lost.
A comfort zone is a magical place where nothing ever grows.
Give yourself a break before you breakdown.
Inspiration within is waiting for you. It's time to go deep.
Imagine your ideals, then make them real.
If you bite the hand that feeds you, it won't taste as good as the food you were fed.
Ideas you believe are absurd ultimately lead to success!
If a man has common sense, he has all the sense there is.
If a true sense of value is to be yours it must come through service.
If absolute can be defined, then absolute is not absolute anymore.
Happiness is enjoying what you got. Never from what you want.
Happiness is not a reward, it's a consequence.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
Go take a rest; you deserve it.
Genius is eternal patience.
Follow the advice of your heart.
Follow the middle path. Neither extreme will make you happy.
Take your time today so you won't walk in mud.
Fight for it. You will come out on the top.
Financial hardship in your life is coming to an end!
Failure is the tuition you pay for success.
Expect a change for the better.
Expect great things, and great things will come.
Examine the situation before you act impulsively.
Everything you are against weakens you. Everything you are for empowers you.
Eat, drink and be merry, for tomorrow you may diet.
Don't repay a kindness, pass it on.
Don't put all your eggs in one basket.
Don't scrap everything! See what you can salvage.
Don't get so caught up in the daily grind that you never find any time to enjoy yourself.
Don't fret. All your friends will be able to zig whenever you zag.
Creative energy is up - capitalize on it.
Curiosity kills boredom. Nothing can kill curiosity.
Common sense is instinct.  Enough of it is genius.
Call an old friend today.
Business is a lot like playing tennis; if you don't serve well, you lose.
Buy things because you need them, not because they are on sale.
Better ask twice than lose yourself once.
Before you wonder \"Am I doing things right,\" ask \"Am I doing the right things?\"
Behavior is a mirror in which everyone shows his own image.
Believe in your abilities, confidence will lead you on.
Balance life with a little sweet & sour.
Ask advice, but use your own common sense.
Ask yourself this question: \"Is my attitude worth catching?\"
Attitude is a little thing that makes a BIG difference.
An unexpected check or fortune will arrive today.
An unexpected event will bring you riches.
An upset is an opportunity to see the truth.
Any job, big or small; do it right, or not at all.
Any rough times are behind you.
Anyone can memorize things, but the important thing is to understand.
An important person will offer you support.
An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
An investment in yourself will pay dividends for the rest of your life.
An old wish will come true.
Although it feels like a roller coaster now, life will calm down.
All your hard work will soon pay off.
All your sorrows will vanish.
All the little things will add to a happy journey.
All that we are is a result of what we have thought.
All the answers you need are right there in front of you!
All the effort you are making will ultimately pay off.
Act boldly and unseen forces will come to your aid.
